Title: Larry J to light up Christmas with family-friendly comedy, fireworks
Summary: Nigerian comedian and show promoter, Olanrewaju Gregory, popularly known as Larry J, will on December 25, 2025, kick off his 4th edition of his family-friendly comedy show tagged MC Larry J: A Night of Comedy and Laughs at the Eko Hotel and Suites, Victoria Island, Lagos .

Title: Monarch calls for govt intervention on Ise-Ekiti roads, other infrastructures
Summary: Monarch calls for govt intervention on Ise-Ekiti roads, other infrastructures . Oba Adetunji David Ajayi (PhD) has called for government intervention on infostructural renewal of community .

Title: Lagos mobile courts order remand of 6 over assault on LASTMA, others
Summary: Mobile Courts ordered remand of six suspected notorious miscreants . 56 vehicles impounded at Lagos Airport Road . Mobile courts order remand over assault on personnel of Lagos State Traffic Management Authority (LASTMA)

Title: CitySports Africa distributes 1000 boots to young footballers
Summary: The Mainbolw of National Stadium, Surulere, came alive on Tuesday, as CitySports Africa unveiled its inaugural 1000 Boot Project amid pomp and pageantry . The event venue was a beehive of activities from 4:00 am .

Title: Driver, others escape death as train collides with bus in Lagos
Summary: A train collided with a Toyota Hiace bus at the Arena area of Oshodi in Lagos State . Driver, others escape death as train collides with bus in Oshodi, Lagos .

Title: State of the Nation: Tinubu has demonstrated courage for national renewal – APC
Summary: Tinubu chose the difficult path of dismantling decades of economic deceit, fiscal indiscipline and governance cowardice, the party said . “President Bola Ahmed Tari chose the . difficult path to dismantle decades of . economic deceit and fiscal . indiscipline,’s ‘cowardice’ and ‘economic .

Title: Sanwo-Olu hosts Jakande, Johnsons, Mogaji, Otedola families for 2025 Eyo Festival
Summary: Babajide Sanwo-Olu hosted representatives of Jakande, Johnsons, Mogaji, and Otedola families for 2025 Eyo Festival . The event took place at the State House Marina, Lagos, amid colourful display of Eyo .

Title: Arsenal’s Kepa Arrizabalaga eager for more League Cup heroics against Chelsea
Summary: Arsenal's Kepa Arrizabalaga eager for more League Cup heroics against Chelsea . "Both semi-finals are big games, and it's going to be tough, but we'll prepare well for the game," he says .

Title: Northern CAN calls for probe of terror financiers, hails Fintiri over Jackson clemency
Summary: Northern CAN calls for probe of sponsors and financiers of terror groups . Northern CAN hails Fintiri over Jackson clemency .

Title: Tension in Anambra shoe dealers’ market as thugs invade, brutalise traders
Summary: The Anambra Shoe Dealers’ Market in Onitsha was thrown into chaos on Monday following a violent invasion by suspected thugs . Several traders were reportedly brutalised .
